BindNewLVBDomainWithChannel.document: This API is used to bind an LVB domain name to a channel.
BindNewLVBDomainWithChannel.name: Binds an LVB domain name to a channel

CreateStreamPackageChannel.document: This API is used to create a StreamPackage channel.
CreateStreamPackageChannel.name: Creates a channel

CreateStreamPackageChannelEndpoint.document: This API is used to create an endpoint on a StreamPackage channel.
CreateStreamPackageChannelEndpoint.name: Creates a channel endpoint

DeleteStreamPackageChannelEndpoints.document: This API is used to delete endpoints from a StreamPackage channel in batches.
DeleteStreamPackageChannelEndpoints.name: Deletes channel endpoints in batches

DeleteStreamPackageChannels.document: This API is used to delete StreamPackage channels in batches.
DeleteStreamPackageChannels.name: Deletes channels in batches

DescribeStreamPackageChannel.document: This API is used to query the information of a StreamPackage channel.
DescribeStreamPackageChannel.name: Queries a channel

DescribeStreamPackageChannels.document: This API is used to query the information of multiple StreamPackage channels.
DescribeStreamPackageChannels.name: Queries multiple channels

ModifyStreamPackageChannel.document: This API is used to modify a StreamPackage channel.
ModifyStreamPackageChannel.name: Modifies a channel

ModifyStreamPackageChannelEndpoint.document: This API is used to modify an endpoint of a StreamPackage channel.
ModifyStreamPackageChannelEndpoint.name: Modifies a channel endpoint

ModifyStreamPackageChannelInputAuthInfo.document: This API is used to modify the input authentication information of a StreamPackage channel.
ModifyStreamPackageChannelInputAuthInfo.name: Modifies the input authentication information of a channel

UnbindCdnDomainWithChannel.document: This API is used to unbind a CDN playback domain name from a channel.
UnbindCdnDomainWithChannel.name: Unbinds a CDN playback domain name from a channel

List of timeout parameter configuration
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value was found.

members.document:
Timeout period (ms), which must be an integer multiple of 1000
.m3u8/.mpd: [1000, 60000]
.ts/.m4s/.mp4: [10000, 1800000]

File extension. Valid values: .m3u8, .ts, .mpd, .m4s, .mp4

members.document:
